document.full_text: in 2003 or 2004, pakistani intelligence agents trailed a suspected militant courier to a house in the picturesque hill town of abbottabad in northern pakistan.
document.title: special report: why the u.s. mistrusts pakistan's spies
lines_and_colors: in 2003 or 2004, pakistani intelligence agents trailed a suspected militant courier to a house in the picturesque hill town of abbottabad in northern pakistan.
